body: I hate when in the mother-son incest doujins, she's f*cked by a friend o acquaintance of the son. dunno, i don't like it. (i would have liked that the son, shigeo, got his revenge with yasuo's mom) (fapped hard with this, tho). Its the only issue with this work. for the rest, a pretty good one.
the part where she gets pregnant was missing :( :(
I really hate ntr...but the art style is amazing so nice fap I guess...if u just don't read when they say mom or mother it'll be fine for us ntr haters
